txt.en: Green grass covers the rolling hills of Eorlsmead, but the horses within Stangard have little to eat.

'As you have seen, my horses are hungry, [placeholder]. I am the keeper of the stables, but... I do not have leave to take them out to graze. It would be too dangerous.\n\n'Would you be willing to bring back some heaps of grass for them? Your help would be much appreciated. I will not tell Sithric -- it can be our secret.'
Green grass grows all over the rocky plains of Eorlsmead.\n\nYou should collect bundles of grass to feed to the horses of Stangard.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. That was a very good deed! I do not like to see these great creatures go hungry.'
The horses of Stangard are in the stables of the city.\n\nYou should bring the grass you collected to Tatwine.
Tatwine is in Stangard.\n\nYou should speak with Tatwine now that you have provided the horses with a better meal.
'These horses deserve to be better fed.'
Feed the grass to the horses ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fed the grass to the horses ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
